title: Miltefosine Impacts Small Molecule Transport in Gram-Positive Bacteria

Miltefosine (MLT) is an alkylphosphocholine with clinical success as an anticancer and antiparasitic drug. Although the mechanism of action of MLT is highly debated, the interaction of MLT with the...
